content.question: Which of the following outcomes will most likely result from the irreversible binding of <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to the G protein?

choices.label: The intracellular concentration of glycogen will increase.
The intracellular concentration of activated protein kinase A will increase.
The intracellular concentration of cyclic <math alttext="A M P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AMP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will increase.
The intracellular concentration of glucose-1-phosphate will increase.

content.answer: The intracellular concentration of glycogen will increase.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
